organization.description:
FKAHEC provides medical services to children attending certain school in Monroe County at no cost. The following services are provided:

* Comprehensive Health Assessments
* School Health and Sport Physicals
* Cold and Flu Season Check-Ups
* Strep and Glucose Testing
* Prescriptions
* Treatment for Minor Injuries
* Vision/Hearing Tests
* Specialty Services
* Weight and Nutrition Counseling
* School Health and Psychology Services


###MON###
organization.name: FKAHEC - SCHOOL HEALTH CLINICS
